data.title: Robert Ford, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Robert Ford stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Robert Ford - Points

Robert Ford scores a career high 30 points (2024)

On January 21, 2024, Robert Ford set his career high in points in a NCAA game. That day he scored 30 points in Montana State Fighting Bobcats's home loss against Montana Grizzlies, 77-87. He also had 7 rebounds, 3 assists, 5 steals. He shot 9/14 from two, 3/4 from three, shooting at 66.7% from the field. He also shot 3/3 from the free-throw line.

Robert Ford - Rebounds

Robert Ford grabs a career high 13 rebounds (2024)

On January 23, 2024, Robert Ford tied his career high in rebounds in a NCAA game. That day he grabbed 13 rebounds in Montana State Fighting Bobcats's home win against Idaho State Bengals, 77-70. He also had 18 points, 3 assists, 2 steals.

Robert Ford - Assists

Robert Ford gives a career high 6 assists (2024)

On January 28, 2024, Robert Ford tied his career high in assists in a NCAA game. That day he dished 6 assists in Montana State Fighting Bobcats's road loss against Portland State Vikings, 94-91. He also had 26 points, 8 rebounds, 4 steals.

Robert Ford - Steals

Robert Ford has a career high 7 steals (2023)

On November 21, 2023, Robert Ford set his career high in steals in a NCAA game. That day he reached 7 steals in Montana State Fighting Bobcats's home loss against Green Bay Phoenix, 53-54. He also had 26 points, 13 rebounds.

Robert Ford - Blocks

Robert Ford blocks a career high 2 shots (2022)

On November 27, 2022, Robert Ford set his career high in blocks in a NCAA game. That day he went for 2 blocks in Montana State Fighting Bobcats's home loss against Quinnipiac Bobcats, 53-70. He also had 8 points, 2 rebounds and 4 assists.
